form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, O.M.B. No. 4-004

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE #GPO: 1973-521-939 Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Form Approved O.M.B. No. 43-R0400 FEE STAMP File No. APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OR SECTION: Sec. 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act Sec. 245 Sec. 214(d), I&N Act Sec. 249 I&NAct Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A. B. C. D. E, or F) @ A. As a-refugee to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act). B. As a person who entered the U.S. with a visa issued to me as the fiancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days resvire after my entry, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Sec. 214(d), I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13, Act of September 11, 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&N Act). 5 F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1, 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section 249, I&N Act). 2. My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 3. Sex IMAM MAHMOODMIAN MOHAMED Male Female 4. I reside in the United States at: (c/o) (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 5. Have you ever applied before for permanent resident 110 WEMBLEY DRIVE DALY CITY-CALIF.94055 status in the U.S.? Yes No 6. My alien registration number 7. I am a citizen of (Country) 8. Date of Birth (If "Yes", give the date and place of filing and is K567119 12-2-1904 final disposition.) INDIA 9. Place of Birth (City or Town). (County, Province, or State) (Country) RANDER (SURAT DISTRICT) GUJRAT STATE INDIA 10. Name as appears on nonimmigrant document (Form I-94) IMAM MAHMOODMIAN MOHAMED 2 I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) SAN FRANCISCO - CALIFORNIA 6-17-1976 JAPAN AIR LINES as a (visitor, student, crewman, parolee, etc.) my I-94 permit number is VISITOR w/ 026 82 02 I was was not inspected. 11. My nonimmigrant visa, number 010545 was issued by the on (Month) (Day) (Year) 12. I am single married United States Consul at (City) (Country) BOMBAY. INDIA MAY 10-1976 divorced widowed 13. I have been married 1 times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) a. Number of times my husband or wife has been married b. Name of husband or wife (Wife give maiden name) / FATIMA MIRZA ABDULLAH c. My husband or wife resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.)(No. & Street)(Town or City )(Province or State) )(Country) 14. a. I have 8 sons or daughters as follows: (Complete all columns as to each son or daughter; if living with you state "with me" in last column; otherwise give city and state or country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now living at SARA BiBI KHAN F RANDER- INDIA 7-11-28 INDIA ABDUL RASHID SUBEDAR M RANDER - INDIA 11-18-32 REEDLEY CALIFORNIA MARIAM BIBI KADERMIA F RANDER-INDIA 3-7-34 REDWOOD CITY, CALIF. NISAR IMAM M RANDER-INDIA 5-19-39 SALINAS , CALIF. ZAHEER SUBEDAR m RANDER- INDIA 12-21-40 WITH ME b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident/status: FATIMA MAHMOODMIYAN IMAM (WIFE). 15. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never been a member of any organization, state "None".) NONE. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D-TRANS. Immigration and Naturalization Service OUT COMPLETED Form I-485 (Rev. 11-1-73) (Page 1)
